short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Formerly Clubify. Transforms text references to Shortcut stories (e.g.: 'sc-<story-id>') to clickable links to Shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension that linkifies Shortcut story numbers on a configurable set of web pages. For specific URL patterns, it will transform text "sc-<story-id>" (e.g. "sc-1234" or "ch1234") to click-able links. For example, when looking at a commit on GitHub you can quickly go to the story issue it refers to.

See the Shortcut documentation for more information about the story naming convention. https://help.shortcut.com/hc/en-us/articles/207540323-Using-the-Shortcut-GitHub-Integration-with-Branches-and-Pull-Requests

This is modified fork of JIRAfy: https://github.com/square/jirafy

Note that the extension will not work with this page (the Chrome store) due to security restrictions in Chrome.
